name: Pillar Men
description:
Fly from pillar to pillar as you blast your enemies out of the map!

Pillar Men is a projectile based shooter where your bullets inherit your velocity.  Landing on the differently coloured pillars allow you to change your weapon and enables unique combat scenarios throughout the large map. Leading your targets, accounting for gravity, all while managing your jetpack and weapons can make scoring kills tough, but incredibly satisfying to pull off!

Pillar Men is currently in development. This is Alpha version 1.12.

Join the discord to find other people to play with!

https://discord.gg/ZuNmXY

Gameplay Controls:

WASD to move your Character.

Spacebar to use the Jetpack.

Mouse to aim and shoot.

Tab to toggle the Scoreboard.

Additional Controls:

F12 to unlock and show the cursor.

Shift + or Shift - to increase/decrease mouse sensitivity.

Ctrl X to quit to the Main Menu.
